E_LG1001.msg: An error occured while accessing your account. Please contact the support and provide them with the error code E_LG1001
E_LG1001.desc: Error occured while trying to query the DB for the existence of the user from email provided during login procedure.

E_LG1002.msg: An error occured while accessing your account. Please contact the support and provide them with the error code E_LG1002
E_LG1002.desc: Error occured while trying to query the DB for the existence of the user from username provided during login procedure.

E_LG1003.msg: No user found with the provided credentials.
E_LG1003.desc: Error occured because the user provided an username or email that is not in the db during login procedure.

E_LG1004.msg: This user has not been verified yet. Please check email inbox for the verification link and if it is expired please signup again.
E_LG1004.desc: Error occured because this user is not verified yet.

E_LG1005.msg: An error occured while accessing your account. Please contact the support and provide them with the error code E_LG1005
E_LG1005.desc: Error occured while comparing the password provided with the one provided by the user during login procedure.

E_LG1006.msg: The password provided is incorrect. Please try again.
E_LG1006.desc: Error occured the user input a wrong password during login procedure.
